about_the_game:
Agarest 2 - DLC Bundle #4


Bonus Point Pack 6
Thank you for your insatiable appetite for our goods and services. We have put together a package of useful points.
Included within: 400,000TP, 1,500PP

Bonus Point Pack 7
Thank you once again for your profligate spending habits. Today we have prepared a heaping helping of party points just for you.
Included points: 3,000PP
(These points can be shared amongst your entire party. Spread the wealth, create a single superhero, or shower them upon a beloved character; it's entirely up to you.)

Bonus Point Pack 9
Thank you once again for your appalling lack of self-control when it comes to spending money. Today we have prepared a heaping helping of party points just for you.
Included points: 15,000PP
(These points can be shared amongst your entire party. Spread the wealth, create a single superhero, or shower them upon a beloved character; it's entirely up to you.)
